Query.SqlString: SELECT Top 32767 ID,Literature FROM Literature WHERE (Literature ='SBZ98')

BibliographicData.Title: A visuo-somatomotor pathway through superior parietal cortex in the macaque monkey: cortical connections of areas V6 and V6A

TracerSubstance.FullName: Horseradish peroxidase, conjugated to wheat germ agglutinin
